Container.Name: UMTK
Container.Overview: UMTK (Upcoming Movies and TV Shows for Kometa) creates 'Coming Soon' collections in your Plex server.
Container.Category: MediaApp:Video MediaServer:Video Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: plex automation collection pin unpin Kometa playlist Netflix trailer Sonarr Radarr
Container.Changes:
### 2025-10-03
Update network mode to host
### 2025-10-01
Initial release
Container.Requires: Requires separate Kometa, Sonarr/Radarr and Plex servers.

Config.Name: Cron Schedule
Config.Description: Cron schedule for running the update (default: daily at 2 AM)

Config.Name: Kometa Config Files
Config.Description: Output directory for generated Kometa YAML files

Config.Name: Placeholder Videos
Config.Description: Path to folder containing placeholder videos (optional)

Config.Name: Sonarr Path
Config.Description: Path to TV shows as seen by Sonarr (optional). Edit Target to match internal Sonarr path exactly.

Config.Name: Radarr Path
Config.Description: Path to movies as seen by Radarr (optional). Edit Target to match internal Radarr path exactly.

Config.Name: Is Docker
Config.Description: Indicate app is running in Docker. Not recommended to change.
